name: vault-worktree
description: Automate Vault development workflow with smart version detection, interactive setup, and intelligent primary worktree management using git worktrees. Reduces manual version changes from 20-40 minutes to <5 seconds.

features.commands: Available for v1.x compatibility (v2.x use skills)
features.skills: Primary interface for v2.x - ask Claude to switch versions or branches
features.hooks: PreToolUse validation to prevent cross-version file edits
features.configuration: Persistent config stored in ~/.claude/vault-worktree.config.json (NEW in v2.0)

breaking-changes: Directory naming changed: vault-2027 â†’ vault-R2027.1 (matches git branch names)
Primary worktree concept introduced: designates main development version
Old v1.x directories (vault-2027 etc.) will be automatically removed during init
migration-guide:
Run /vault-worktree:worktree-init to automatically upgrade from v1.x. Script will:
1. Detect old vault-2027 style directories
2. Create new vault-R2027.1 style directories
3. Store configuration in ~/.claude/vault-worktree.config.json
4. Mark first version as primary worktree
No manual cleanup needed - it's fully automated!
